title: Recoverypt.2
body: Hey! I created the other post. I have created a ticket and It is way longer and more detailed. But I keep getting a response from a bot that does not help me what so ever! Please help! I rather have an actual person help me because I really don't want to end up not being able to play till like the end of the year.

replies.body: So i am not suppose to reply to the blitzbot? My ticket number is 31223984

You can respond to Blitzbot, but some patience is required to get your ticket fielded to the proper team.   Thanks for the ticket number!  It looks like based on your specific issue, you have a new ticket number to proceed with your issue.  Be sure to check out your most recent specialist response for details on that.  Best of luck!

Blitzbot isn't human, but it may relay questions to help prep you until an account specialist gets to you.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check on the status.  Just keep in mind that if you keep spamming responses, you may drop to the bottom of the queue, delaying a specialist reaching out to you.
